quote: I don't know if this deception qualified as a half-step down the slippery slope. I had no sensation of sliding. But of course we never notice the descent until we're rocketing along at high velocity.
quote_letters: I DONT KNOW IF THIS DECEPTION QUALIFIED AS A HALF-STEP DOWN THE SLIPPERY SLOPE I HAD NO SENSATION OF SLIDING BUT OF COURSE WE NEVER NOTICE THE DESCENT UNTIL WERE ROCKETING ALONG AT HIGH VELOCITY
